favourite.article: I recite these lyrics as a devotion, usually in the morning.
Used to sing this song when I was teenager. Very refreshing hymn. I sing it now every morning in my prayer. Awesome hymn full of eternal truth.

I love this song! When I am not feeling so "spiritual" "overcoming" this song is an honest but truth-filled song that ushers me into His presence. Dark and cheerless is the morn unaccompanied by thee....so very true. Oh Lord impart Your inward light!
Dayspring from on high be near, Daystar, in my heart appear.
